title: What if all these bots are whats effected our ping?
body:
I just think that would be interesting to know. To be entirely honest I have no idea if it could or not other than overload on the servers.. Right? xD Aram is filled with it until you're lv30 with my experience. 

My ping used to be solid 45 or 46 and it moved to a solid 60-61 and in game it spikes a little more often then it did before.
Can anyone help?

Have a good day.

replies.body:
I don't think it's bots either, but I am experiencing a LOT of ping issues since the last patch.  I played one game this morning and it was fine, tried two this afternoon and had ping spikes of up to 700.  Basically couldn't play and just lost automatically, I couldn't even see what was happening.

Are you also having ping issues?

The number of players currently in matches won't affect your personal ping. Your ping is a measure of how quickly the signals are going between your network and our servers so other players connections won't be influencing it.
